## utils namespace

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Coordinate](./blockly.utils.coordinate.md) | Class for representing coordinates and positions. |
|  [Rect](./blockly.utils.rect.md) | Class for representing rectangular regions. |
|  [Size](./blockly.utils.size.md) | Class for representing sizes consisting of a width and height. |
|  [Svg](./blockly.utils.svg.md) | A name with the type of the SVG element stored in the generic. |

## Enumerations

|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [KeyCodes](./blockly.utils.keycodes.md) | Key codes for common characters.<!-- -->Copied from Closure's goog.events.KeyCodes<!-- -->This list is not localized and therefore some of the key codes are not correct for non US keyboard layouts. See comments below. |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [checkMessageReferences(message)](./blockly.utils.checkmessagereferences.md) | Validates that any %<!-- -->{<!-- -->MSG\_KEY<!-- -->} references in the message refer to keys of the Msg string table. |
|  [genUid()](./blockly.utils.genuid.md) | Generate a unique ID. |
|  [getBlockTypeCounts(block, opt\_stripFollowing)](./blockly.utils.getblocktypecounts.md) | Get a map of all the block's descendants mapping their type to the number of children with that type. |
|  [getDocumentScroll()](./blockly.utils.getdocumentscroll.md) | Gets the document scroll distance as a coordinate object. Copied from Closure's goog.dom.getDocumentScroll. |
|  [getRelativeXY(element)](./blockly.utils.getrelativexy.md) | Return the coordinates of the top-left corner of this element relative to its parent. Only for SVG elements and children (e.g. rect, g, path). |
|  [getScrollDeltaPixels(e)](./blockly.utils.getscrolldeltapixels.md) | Returns the scroll delta of a mouse event in pixel units. |
|  [is3dSupported()](./blockly.utils.is3dsupported.md) | Check if 3D transforms are supported by adding an element and attempting to set the property. |
|  [isRightButton(e)](./blockly.utils.isrightbutton.md) | Returns true this event is a right-click. |
|  [isTargetInput(e)](./blockly.utils.istargetinput.md) | Returns true if this event is targeting a text input widget? |
|  [mouseToSvg(e, svg, matrix)](./blockly.utils.mousetosvg.md) | Returns the converted coordinates of the given mouse event. The origin (0,0) is the top-left corner of the Blockly SVG. |
|  [noEvent(e)](./blockly.utils.noevent.md) | Halts the propagation of the event without doing anything else. |
|  [parseBlockColour(colour)](./blockly.utils.parseblockcolour.md) | Parse a block colour from a number or string, as provided in a block definition. |
|  [replaceMessageReferences(message)](./blockly.utils.replacemessagereferences.md) | Replaces string table references in a message, if the message is a string. For example, "%<!-- -->{<!-- -->bky\_my\_msg<!-- -->}<!-- -->" and "%<!-- -->{<!-- -->BKY\_MY\_MSG<!-- -->}<!-- -->" will both be replaced with the value in Msg\['MY\_MSG'\]. |
|  [runAfterPageLoad(fn)](./blockly.utils.runafterpageload.md) | Calls a function after the page has loaded, possibly immediately. |
|  [screenToWsCoordinates(ws, screenCoordinates)](./blockly.utils.screentowscoordinates.md) | Converts screen coordinates to workspace coordinates. |
|  [tokenizeInterpolation(message)](./blockly.utils.tokenizeinterpolation.md) | Parse a string with any number of interpolation tokens (%1, %2, ...). It will also replace string table references (e.g., %<!-- -->{<!-- -->bky\_my\_msg<!-- -->} and %<!-- -->{<!-- -->BKY\_MY\_MSG<!-- -->} will both be replaced with the value in Msg\['MY\_MSG'\]). Percentage sign characters '%' may be self-escaped (e.g., '%%'). |
